cells.data:
### 'My' notation and conventions

* $$W_{n,k}:=\frac{\mathrm{GL}_n(\mathbb{C})}{\mathrm{GL}_{n-k}(\mathbb{C})}$$ (**N.B.** we use $\GL$ rather than $\mathrm{U}$) is the space of $k$-frames in $\mathbb{C}^n$ (as opposed to the $\mathrm{U}(n)$ definition, which gives _orthonormal_ $k$-frames).
* $W_{n,k}$ has a trivial rank-$???$ sub-bundle
* We usually work (for transgression) with $W_{n,k-1}$ â€” have to be careful to not make degree mistakes because of this!
* We transgress $c_k$ of a rank-$r$ bundle to $\H^{2k-1}(W_{n,n-k+1};\mathbb{Z})$

### Other notations

* In [BM96] _they_ write $W_{n,k}$ to mean what _we_ call $W_{n,n-k}$, i.e. $$W^\text{BM}_{n,k}:=\frac{\mathrm{GL}_n(\mathbb{C})}{\mathrm{GL}_k(\mathbb{C})}.$$

### Special cases

|$W_{n,k}$|$k$|Notes|
|-|-|-|
|$\mathbb{R}^{2n-1}\setminus{(0,\ldots,0)}$|1|this is the non-unital version of $S^{2n-1}$|
|$\mathrm{SL}_n(\mathbb{C})$|$n-1$|it is a principal homogeneous space for $\mathrm{SL}_n(\mathbb{C})$ (diffeomorphic to $\mathrm{SL}_n(\mathbb{C})$)|
|$\mathrm{GL}_n(\mathbb{C})$|$n$|it is a principal homogeneous space for $\mathrm{GL}_n(\mathbb{C})$ (diffeomorphic to $\mathrm{GL}_n(\mathbb{C}))$|
